abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 damage.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash Chen's keg, dealing 50 damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 96 additional damage over 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Wandering Keg
heroics.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

heroics.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroics.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

original.name: Chen
original.title: Legendary Brewmaster
original.description: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.
original.shortDescription: A potent Bruiser that will dominate if the enemy team is lacking mobility.

baseHeroInfo.name: Chen
baseHeroInfo.title: Legendary Brewmaster
baseHeroInfo.description: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A potent Bruiser that will dominate if the enemy team is lacking mobility.

trait.name: Fortifying Brew
trait.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after he stops drinking.

abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 damage.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash Chen's keg, dealing 50 damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 96 additional damage over 3 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Wandering Keg
heroicAbilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

otherAbilities.name: Fire
otherAbilities.description: Increase the Attack Speed of the spirits by 100% for 5 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Earth
otherAbilities.description: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Storm
otherAbilities.description: Increase the Movement Speed of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.

skins.name: Legendary Brewmaster
skins.description: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.

skins.name: Wanderer Chen
skins.description: The limitless realms of the Nexus are the perfect place for a world-wanderer like Chen Stormstout. Who knows what secret ingredients and lost tales are waiting to be discovered!

skins.name: Brewmaster Chen
skins.description: Why do we fight? To protect home, and family. To preserve balance, and bring harmony. For Chen, the true question is: What is worth fighting for?

skins.name: Lunar Chen
skins.description: The loremasters say that coins are a symbol of fortune and luck. During the Lunar Festival, elders hand out Coins of Ancestry to those who seek them out and pay their respects.

skins.name: Warmaster Chen
skins.description: The Warmasters serve as the unbreakable front line of Lei Shen's Grand Army. Once the Kaldorei are broken before him, the Well of Eternity will belong to the Thunder King forever.
